HighlightGPT: Your AI-Powered Research Assistant

Unlock the power of AI for instant insights on any webpage. HighlightGPT transforms your browsing experience by providing intelligent responses to any text you highlight.

Key Features:
- Instant AI Analysis: Simply highlight any text on a webpage and get an AI-generated response in seconds.
- Customizable Prompts: Tailor the AI's approach with custom prompts for different contexts or tasks.
- User-Friendly Interface: Clean, intuitive design for seamless integration into your browsing workflow.
- Privacy-Focused: Your data stays local; only highlighted text is processed.
- Works Everywhere: Compatible with all websites, from news articles to research papers.

Perfect for:
✓ Students seeking quick explanations or summaries
✓ Researchers looking for alternative perspectives
✓ Professionals needing rapid information synthesis
✓ Curious minds exploring complex topics

How it works:
1. Highlight any text on a webpage
2. Click the HighlightGPT icon
3. Receive an AI-generated response based on the highlighted text

Powered by advanced language models, HighlightGPT brings the power of AI to your fingertips, making web browsing more informative and efficient than ever before.

Upgrade your online experience with HighlightGPT - Your personal AI research assistant, available anytime, anywhere on the web.

Note: Requires an OpenAI API key (not included). Free to use, but API usage may incur costs based on OpenAI's pricing.
